description: General intake forms or specific queries from the tax office.
content_info: Forms requesting personal, financial, or tax-related information from the taxpayer. These are typically used for initial data collection or follow-up inquiries from the Finanzamt.
examples: Completed client onboarding forms, tax registration forms, 2024 Germany Tax Questionnaire.

description: Critical letters that require action or document a decision.
content_info: Official letters and correspondence from tax authorities or important communications requiring taxpayer attention. These include tax assessment notices, power of attorney documents, and official decisions.
examples: Letters from the Finanzamt, power of attorney, tax assessment notices, official rulings.

description: The core document containing personal data and basic tax info. Also known as the 'Main Form' or cover sheet.
content_info: Personal information, bank details, summary of income, special expenses, extraordinary burdens, and tax reductions. This is the foundational document that summarizes all attached annexes.
typical_documents: Personal data forms (name, address, bank details)
examples: The basic 4-page personal info form (name, address, bank details), ESt 1A form.

description: Private expenses that are tax-deductible by law.
content_info: Contributions and expenses that can be deducted from taxable income, including church tax, charitable donations, and initial vocational training costs.
examples: Church tax, donation receipts, initial vocational training costs.

description: Unavoidable, high private expenses compared to the average person. Documented under § 33b EStG.
content_info: Medical expenses, care costs, lump sum amounts according to § 33b EStG. These are expenses that significantly exceed what is typical for most taxpayers.
examples: Medical bills, dental costs, funeral expenses, disability-related costs, nursing home expenses.

description: Contributions toward future security and insurance. Pension-related expenses.
content_info: Health, nursing care, pension, accident, and liability insurance contributions. Contributions to statutory/private health insurance and pension insurance.
examples: Health, long-term care, and unemployment insurance certificates, pension insurance statements.

description: Specifically for certified private pension plans. Tax-favored retirement contributions.
content_info: Contributions to certified pension plans (Riester pension). Payments into Riester contracts for tax incentives.
examples: Riester or Rürup pension contribution statements, Riester contract payments.

description: Expenses and data related to children. Consideration of children for tax purposes.
content_info: Information on children, child benefit (Kindergeld), child allowance (Kinderfreibetrag), and childcare costs. Covers both minor and adult children.
typical_documents: Information on minor and adult children
examples: School fee receipts, childcare invoices (Kita), child benefit info, information on minor and adult children.

description: Income from a registered commercial business. Income and expenditure from commercial activities.
content_info: Income from sole proprietorships and commercial enterprises. Includes trade tax documents and profit/loss statements.
examples: Profit/loss statements for a shop, trade tax documents, income from sole proprietorships.

description: Income from professional 'liberal' services (doctors, lawyers, etc.). Income and expenses from freelance activities.
content_info: Income and expense documentation for freelancers or consultants. Covers self-employed professionals like doctors, lawyers, tax consultants.
examples: Invoices and expense logs for freelancers or consultants, income as a doctor, lawyer, or tax consultant.

description: Wages from domestic/foreign employment or residency status. Salary and income-related expenses.
content_info: Salary, income-related expenses, tax-exempt employer benefits, commuting allowance. Annual salary statements (Lohnsteuerbescheinigung) and foreign paystubs.
examples: Annual salary statements (Lohnsteuerbescheinigung), foreign paystubs, salary, wages, travel expenses to work.

description: Costs incurred to earn income (strictly work-related).
content_info: Work-related expenses that can be deducted from taxable income. Includes commuting costs, work equipment, and home office expenses.
examples: Commuting logs, work equipment (laptop), home office bills, professional training costs.

description: Income from investments, interest, or dividends. Capital gains subject to withholding tax.
content_info: Capital income subject to German withholding tax including interest, dividends, and share gains. Annual tax certificates from banks and dividend statements. Also includes KAP-INV for foreign investment income without domestic tax deduction and KAP-BET for income from participations.
examples: Annual tax certificates from banks, dividend statements, interest from savings accounts, profits from share sales.

description: Income/expenses from renting out property. Letting and leasing income.
content_info: Rental income and income-related expenses from apartments, houses, and garages. Includes property repair bills and management fees.
examples: Rental contracts, property repair bills, property management fees, rental income from apartments, houses, garages.

description: General category for income earned outside Germany.
content_info: Proof of foreign taxes paid and foreign income statements. Documentation of income earned in other countries.
examples: Proof of foreign taxes paid, foreign income statements.

description: Information regarding international tax treaties or status. Additional information for income tax returns.
content_info: Double taxation treaty documents, certificates of residence, and supplementary information for international tax scenarios.
examples: Double taxation treaty documents, certificates of residence, international tax scenario information.

description: Chronological logs or time-based documentation.
content_info: Time-based records and logs used for tax documentation purposes, including travel logs and appointment records.
examples: Driver's logbooks (Fahrtenbuch), appointment diaries, travel calendars.

description: Documents belonging to the prior tax period.
content_info: Tax documents from the previous tax year, used for reference or carryover purposes.
typical_documents: Final tax assessment from last year (Steuerbescheid)
examples: The final tax assessment (Steuerbescheid) from the last year.

description: Documents for the upcoming tax period.
content_info: Documents related to future tax obligations, including pre-payment notices and future contracts.
examples: Pre-payment notices for the next year, future contracts.

description: Documents that are irrelevant to the tax return.
content_info: Documents that have no tax relevance and should not be included in the tax return submission.
examples: Private grocery receipts, internal drafts, duplicates, non-tax-related documents.
